ENGLISH:

...ZOMFOBIA... A guy diagnosed Zomfobia has escaped from a mental hospital, but the psychic securityguard is after him. Why is he running away, did he see something strange over there? In the desperate chase and in scream for help he gets a lot of unwished surprices! If he manage to escape and what the diagnose \"Zomfobia\" stands for we will all find out in this splatter/horror action movie directed by Erik Bylund (SWEDEN). Main character performed by Jon Berggren. Cast, Niklas Hinders, Henning Nielsen and Hans Andersson, (all three performed in the Action Comedy \"BLUSH\" produced 2004.) Get ready for 10 gallons of blood! Produced year: 2004 , Original DVD-XviD-rip , Length: 18mins , Genre: Splatter/Horror Action Comment: Very well made Swedish made amateur movie! -Ã‚Â¨Nixxie
